entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content:
• I am currently an undergraduate student in Hohai University, Nanjing, China.
  • I major in environmental science and engineering through my 4-year undergraduate study. In the meantime, however, my broad and diverse experience has covered Computational Mathematics, Mathematical Statistics & Probability Theory(my expected M.S. major) and Data Analysis in Natural Science. These experience brought me a wide sight from my place and made me who I am today.
  • I am on my way to be a researcher in the field of statistics and applied mathematics.
  • Choice of homepage theme is from ‘The Legend of Zelda’, a series of outstanding console games which have brought me happiness.
